about_the_game:
Rule and guide a Mesoamerican village through the adventures of everyday life in the heart of a ruthless jungle!

In this god-game-meets-city-builder, you must manage a cute Aztec village and defend it from the dangers lurking in the jungle.

Earn the faith of your followers, and gift them with divine knowledge to rebuild the village that is now in ruins.

Manage your Aztec village

Gathering food, chopping wood, putting out fires... Life for your villagers isn't always easy.

But one thing is for sure: they can't manage without you!

Answer prayers from your followers

Your protégés won't stop asking you for this, or rather that.

As a God, use your powers to bring joy and happiness to your flock, or punish them for their insolence!

Arm and defend your followers in battle against rival tribes

Many dangers lurk in the jungle! And some enemies can't be defeated without your help.

Craft more than 150 different weapons and outfits

We thought it was a good amount. What do you think? It's a bit of work.

Send expeditions through the wild jungle

Designate your best people to obtain the many treasures that abound in the surrounding jungle! And you can always negotiate with the traveling merchant - it's less risky.

Sacrifice your most fervent followers

Accumulate precious blood and unlock ever more knowledge by sacrificing the most pious villagers in your honor! We promise, they won't hold it against you.

Expand the village

Regain your lost glory.

Restore your flamboyant city, stone by stone!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu Linux 12.04 LTS, 13.x
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4, Intel Centrino, Intel Xeon, or Intel Core Duo (or compatible) 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any OpenGL 2.0-capable graphics card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

  • Processor: Dual-Core Intel
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any OpenGL 2.0-capable graphics card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
